Properties

deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedcodeVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0940 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
LCP Limited Coverage PolicyLimited Coverage Policy
NFDA Non-FDA Approved Diagnositic ProcedureNon-FDA Approved Diagnositic Procedure
FLDP Frequency Limited Diagnostics ProcedureFrequency Limited Diagnostics Procedure
NT New Test - Limited Diagnostic HistoryNew Test - Limited Diagnostic History

name: LimitationTypeCode
title: limitationTypeCode
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts specifying the type of limitation.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the DPS segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0940 (Limitation Type Codes)
